name: Arkanoid_Remak
description:
Greetings young retro gamer !

Welcome to the mythical arcade game Arkanoid! The concept remains fundamental : you will have to move a bar from left to right to bounce a ball destined to destroy all the blocks present on your screen. 

Done as homework, this is the 3rd game we have created with method, energy and passion. 

We have reserved for you a most stimulating experience where reflexes, anticipation and reactivity will be put to the test. Have fun destroying everything!

Controls Team Make your best score

Send us a screenshot with your best record !

The game made by the others gourps : 

Space Invaders

Frogger

Q*Bert

Donkey Kong
